text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Holy cow, Trump laid down hard on the lies and propaganda in this video! So, we had broken tests for Covid-19 before Covid-19 even existed?? You, Trump, are one sorry piece of work. No, we have not tested more than other countries. Idiot...#theResistance
